topic.title: Selecting a Log or Configuration File

body.p: In the Log Timeline panel, you can choose the day for which you want to consult the log files. Click a dot on the time line to select a day. Log time line

When you have selected the day on the timeline, click on that node in the rack for which you want to consult the log details. If you haven't selected a dot in the Log Timeline, the displayed log files will be the most recent.

There are various log files, depending on the device type:
Controller and Storage Node
* :ref:`Storage Enclosure <log_stor_enc>`
* :ref:`Switch <log_switch>`

p.note: You see only the log files that are actually available on the node.
